answers.answer: The question is if you have insurance what they will cover.  If no insurance what brand has the cheapest test strips as that is what ends up costing the most.  Walmart has the cheapest (I think).As far as testing,  test before he eats, 1 hour after and 2 hours after he eats.U\for testing use the SIDE of his fingertip  less nerves there so less pain.
